DOC.detailed_description: 23andMe create web-based Parkinson 's research initiative understand genetic association find Parkinson 's patient ' DNA disease . To learn , visit : http : //www.23andme.com/pd/ . You participate research initiative without leave home . If eligible participate , send in-home 23andMe DNA kit cost . We ask short online survey ( 15-20 ) Parkinson 's journey , symptom , response treatment . Enrollment on-going open individual diagnose Parkinson 's disease resident U.S . Participants receive access ancestry information uninterpreted genetic data . Participants also receive regular update research effort finding .
